page.title: 14SHOPPING PREFERENCES,UPWEY
page.content: A QUESTIONNAIRE WAS CARRIED TO DISCOVER THE SHOPPING HABITS OF THE LOCAL RESIDENTS OF UPWEY, THE RESULTS WERE AS FOLLOWS:{ {1.}MOST PEOPLE SHOPPED IN UPWEY AT LEAST SOME OF THE TIME. {2.}WEYMOUTH WAS MORE POPULAR THAN DORCHESTER FOR THOSE PEOPLE THAT SHOPPED OUTSIDE UPWEY. {3.}THE OPENING OF A NEW SUPERMARKET CLOSE TO UPWEY,HAS SURPRISINGLY NOT AFFECTED THE SHOPPING HABITS OF MOST OF THE LOCALS. {4.}MOST PEOPLE SAID THAT THEY WOULD RATHER SEE A NEW SUPERMARKET BUILT THAN SMALL INDIVIDUAL SHOPS. UPWEY IS UNDERSTANDABLY NOT A VERY POPULAR PLACE TO SHOP, AS THE FACILITIES ARE RESTRICTIVE.
